description: ![colour.js - ANSI terminal colors](https://raw.github.com/dcodeIO/colour.js/master/colour.png) =========== A cored, fixed, documented and optimized version of the popular [colors.js](https://github.com/Marak/colors.js). Can be used as a drop-in replacement, also works correctly in the browser, provides a CSS mode and has been compiled through Closure Compiler using advanced optimizations. Additionally, nearly every issue and pull request on the original has been incorporated.
name: colour
